snippet.title: The Rebellion: Steam Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Rebellion is a 3rd Person RTS hybrid that blends the intensity of ARPG combat with the scope and control of real-time strategy. Craft equipment for your armies, level up your hero, secure rare resources, and burn your enemy's village to the ground!

Available on Steam April 1st, 2021. 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1361750/The_Rebellion/

Join our Discord!
https://discord.com/invite/eYRMy3Q

Music by Zhao Shen
https://soundcloud.com/stormsound/a-warriors-quest
